title: Kinks & Hijinx: A Series of Erotic Short Stories
description: What would you do if someone you didn't know had revealing pictures of your wife? They name the price to pay if you want to keep things quiet. The demands are simple and they don't want money...Kinks & Hijinks explores 7 stories centred on the choices and pleasures of everyday life. Inside you will find obsession, voyeurism, blackmail, betrayal, fantasy and lust. The stories feature a range of deep inner desires twisted with the consequences we face along the way. Journey through the lives and temptation of sinners as they walk the tenuous line between truth and deceit.
author: Rowan Wile
